job_description: Marketing Intern for Social Media – Europe Assessing market trends, quantifying opportunities, and developing marketing programs, Field Marketing at Dell Technologies is at the forefront of customer engagement. Responsible for a specific location, department or product, our teams drive marcom strategy – from making budget recommendations to defining roadmaps and informing content themes. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as Marketing Intern on Dell Technologies Global Social Media Strategy & Operations Team located in Bratislava, Slovakia. What you’ll achieve As a Marketing intern , you will be part of the team who leads social media strategy and operations for Europe main markets: France, Germany and United Kingdom. We are a global team of social media experts across the globe. You will have a fundamental role by aligning with multiple internal and external stakeholders all information needed to enable campaign briefings – supporting social media vehicle leads in the most relevant tasks to drive successful social media campaigns across key platforms on both Dell and Alienware brands. You will: Assist Social Media Vehicle Leads in their main tasks to handover campaign briefings and facilitate execution, supporting both localization of global campaigns & local influencer campaigns that will live in multiple social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Snapchat. Coordinate cross-teams alignment about information needed for campaign briefing (social media vehicle lead, localization, GTM team, vendor funding, third party agencies, among others). Produce ad-hoc analysis and reporting from Sprinklr about specific campaign performance. Provide insights, based on market best practices and performance ad-hoc reports, on how to improve social media content. Take the first step towards your dream career. Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Daily University student in marketing, business administration, public relations, publicity fields or other related field Strong written and verbal English, capability to work and interact with wider and multi-cultural team (and/or German languages skills can be a differentiator and are very welcomed) Agility to work within defined processes and meet deadline, while being open for changes and encourage process adjustments Ability to lead multiple projects simultaneously Ability to lead with multiple direction changes Strong team player and supporter Salary starting from: 5.50 EUR per working hour Benefits When you join the Dell team as an intern you become part of a winning company that rewards you with following: Being part of a community of more than 110 interns at Dell Bratislava Access into Learning studio – more than 1,000 online trainings Dell Laptop Possibility to continue after your graduation in professional development programs Networking groups – collaboration, community and personal development (ERGs) Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Application closing date: 31.3.2024 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.
